resources.string: It is an easy Kanban system app. \tYou can scan QR codes of used product and send this information to your supplier. \tMore information about application functions you can find at www.borucki.co/easy_kanban_app
You can customize this screen (change logo, text and display time). \tThanks for using Easy Kanban App
Podane hasło jest niepoprawne Spróbuj ponownie.
